QuestData.Title: Lingering on the Edge
QuestData.Description:
I h-have made... mistakes...
<Absolon draws in a rasping breath.>
I want to make it right... I want to live! But the madness... the WITHERING..
I am... fading.
<Absolon stares at you helplessly.>
QuestData.CompletionText: Can you help me? Is there nothing you can do?
QuestData.RewardText: <Absolon immediately consumes the Ancient Mana and seems incapable of speech for a short while.>
